website_summaries.verdict: An all natural, hydrating serum that soothes skin and reduces redness.
pros: Vitamin and mineral-packed sake moisturizes the skin while traces of caffeine and sea-algae help quell inflammation or irritation and boost brightness
Many users attest to its benefits for rosacea
cons: More hydrating and less brightening than other options on the market

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great product. Works well for my combination dry skin and sensitive skin and my husbands VERY sensitive skin (i mean have to do a test patch of each product before use kind of sensitive skin). It’s a heavier oil so if you want this under makeup, you need to but this baby on waaaaaaaaay in advance. I use it at night. I do my full skincare routine then and tailor it down to bare minimum what I need for day time. All in all, a little goes a long way, works great, and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: One of my all time favorite serums
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried everything from La Mer to korean skin care regime. I looove this. I can’t rave enough. I use a Koran spray, then this, then a Korean ampoules and my skin is super hydrated and healthy. It absorbs immediately. It’s great. And I love the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Serum
customer_reviews.text: I use this serum every night before bed and its been great for my sensitive skin. It reduces redness and gives you a natural looking glow. Couldn't recommend more highly!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I put a few drops in my face lotion and apply it that way, otherwise it’s super wet on my skin and I don’t feel it absorbs the same. BUT, the instructions say to use it by itself and rub it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jdchavez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, I mix with my moisturizer and it works really well for combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Patcat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for acne and scars
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t help me with my acne or the scars but it smells great and also does moisturize my skin without the oily filling which I don’t like on my face. It’s pricy which is a big down side but works great for me in terms of a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rani  Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very light moisturizer, didn't notice much hydration/brightening
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is fragrence-free -- my skin is sensitive and fragrances annoy both my skin and my sense of smell. It's very lightweight and doesn't leave a greasy feeling at all, but it also doesn't leave much of a hydrating effect either. Given that it's called "hydrating and brightening serum," I was disappointed not to really notice much, if any, brightening or reduction in redness. As a lightweight, fragrance-free moisturizer it does fine, but for the price point I have preferred other brands (Olay, Elizabeth Arden) for hydration.
customer_reviews.author: NY to VA

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful hydrated serum!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely surprised by how well and thorough moisturizing this serum is. A lot of serums I've tried always felt like they dried with a sort of film and that my skin didn't absorb it. Erno Hyder-therapy left my skin feeling soft, smooth and you only need a little for your face and neck. The price is INSANE for the amount you get but you are paying for quality. Oh and the scent is beautiful! It smells like a spring field full of fragrant flowers! I can't stop raving about this product! An investment well worth it - especially now that winter is on its way and I have the dryest skin ever! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Don't know about brightening claim but it does reduce the redness
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and broken capillaries on my face that give my skin a reddish tinge. I have been using this Sake Essence and I have noticed a reduction in the redness of my skin. I haven't noticed any hydrating or brightening of my skin, but if it can get rid of some of the redness than it is worth it. The product has a slight floral scent, and absorbs quickly into my skin. It doesn't leave any greasy residue, it doesn't irritate my skin, and it doesn’t negatively react with any of the other products I use.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Boscia Sake Serum
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this product, the hygienic dropper and how just a few drops goes a long way. It glides on the skin and absorbs quickly. My issue - my skin looks the same before and after. I did not notice a reduction in redness or more even skin coloration. That said, I have been using it just over a week twice a day so it may take more time. I do feel the product adds a little moisture to the skin. I am hoping that over time I see a visible brightening effect and can update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Great For Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: This formula, which comes with a dropper, takes about 3 drops in the morning and 3 drops at night (after washing off make up) in order to see a difference/results. I like that it soaks in easily, doesn't feel greasy or heavy, and skin has a soft, powder-like finish. I did notice a bit of tightening afterwards but it wasn't drying. I did add a bit of extra moisture cream afterwards on dryer days.
customer_reviews.author: Talvi

customer_reviews.title: Visible effect, absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because i put this product on, left the bathroom and got distracted with a toddler and puppy, came back and thought "my skin looks really fresh today" having forgotten i had even used this product. Very Lightly fragranced, if at all. I just noticed a light fresh scent. Great lightweight texture that absorbs completely, no residue to worry about if applied before makeup. And results may vary, but I noticed a difference in my skin within 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Reduces the redness
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love a company that has a great brand/mission statement and sticks to it. I was interested in this because it was vegan and also for its anti-inflammatory properties. After a couple of days using this I noticed that the redness in my skin was getting a lot lighter, so I stuck with it and I'm so glad. My skin looks so much better and feels a lot softer.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: refreshing - feels great on dry skin
customer_reviews.text: boscia Sake Hydrating and Brightening Serum feels great on dry skin. You only need two or three drops warmed in your hands and then pressed into your face to get the full effects of brightening and hydrating your skin. I follow this immediately with a cream moisturizer to lock in the hydration. I have only used this product for ten days and I can already see less redness and patchy dry spots on my skin. It feels great and it really helps in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin smoother and softer
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this serum at nighttime. It feels clean on your face and it doesn't leave any residue on my pillows when going to sleep. It also doesn't feel like it's all rubbing off onto the sheets. It feels like water going on your skin that once evaporated leaves your skin slightly smoother and softer. There's no greasy residue or unpleasant odor.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna.w.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothes my skin and makes it brighter with less blemishes.
customer_reviews.text: This thin serum brightens and smooths your skin for a flawless look. It is a very thin potion that also made my palms very smooth because I always rub my hands together before applying product on my face. I have had no unpleasant side effects. A thin serum like this should go on first with thicker serums and moisturizers to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it say
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Sake Hydrating and Brightening Essence for about a month now. My skin, which is winter-dry right now, just slurps it up. It provides moisture without the weight and pore-clogging of other serums I've used. There is very little scent, which is an huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would help reduce redness that I sometimes have on my face but after using it for three weeks, I cannot tell a difference. It does leave your face feeling smooth and fresh. It is easily applied with a dropper. A few drops in the palm of your hand seems to be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip O.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't find it very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: My skin can get dry in the winter so I was excited to try this serum. Unfortunately, I did not find it to be very hydrating. It did have a slight brightening effect, but I wasn't impressed with it overall. Perhaps it works better for those who have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Linzstar

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 2 weeks now. I have not noticed any significant change in my skin. It does not irritate my sometimes sensitive skin & it does hydrate. No magical effects but it does feel good on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product a few times so it is too early to say. I felt a need to use more than the few drops I was instructed to use, as my skin seemed to soak it up. I will monitor my progress and keep vine informed.
customer_reviews.author: Natchmo

customer_reviews.title: Great brightening serum!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Have been using for a few months now and it’s made such a difference in my skin! I wouldn’t call it moisturizing-I have dry-ish skin and still need a few layers of moisturizer but it gives my skin such a gorgeous glow. I’ve been getting tons of compliments on my skin. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice serum to moisturize. goes on light and doesn't feel heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nele

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - questionable results for dark spots
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 3 weeks on a melasma/dark spot on my cheek. The product is nice - feels nice and smells nice ... but I don't see any noticeable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: boscia Sake Hydrating and Brightening Serum - Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Natural and Clean Skincare | Natural Vegan Sake Face Serum for Calming Redness and Hydrating Skin, 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description:
boscia Natural Sake Facial Serum for Smooth, Calm Skin.

Brighten and intensely hydrate your complexion with Sake Hydrating and Brightening Serum. Crafted with natural ingredients like Sake, Sea Whip, and Caffeine, this gel-textured serum immediately brightens, soothes, and reduces redness while delivering long-lasting moisture to the skin. Vitamin and mineral-rich Sake immediately increases skin hydration and brightness. Sea Whip possess anti-inflammatory benefits, soothes, and calms skin by blocking inflammation from external irritants and allergens. Caffeine works to soothe, detoxify, and renew skin. This serum is formulated for all skin types and provides all-day moisture while calming your skin.

FEATURES: Natural ingredients. Brightens and soothes skin. Calms redness and hydrates skin. Formulated for all skin types.

INGREDIENTS SPOTLIGHT: Sake, Caffeine, Sea Whip, Jojoba Leaf, Willowherb.

HOW TO USE: Apply two to three drops to palm and press into skin. Can be used in the morning prior to makeup or at night. For all skin types.

PACKAGE INCLUDES: boscia Sake Hydrating and Brightening Serum, 1.7 fl oz.



BRAND STORY
Plants are the secret to our skincare success. We're revolutionizing beauty routines around the world with products that are made for play and meant to be shared. Trust us, your skin wants in on the fun.
